text.more: This visualization was created by Ricardo Gomez Zamudio using the template provided by InteractiveVis project. Information of relations between transformative skills was based on the Inner Development Goals Framework.
text.intro: The Inner Development Goals (IDG) Framework brings together a set of transformational skills so humankind grow on the inside. The IDG Framework put together these transformational skills within 5 dimensions of: Being (brown), Thinking (pink), Relating (red), Collaborating (orange) and Acting (dark red).
text.title: Transformational skills for Sustainable Development?
